ListItem.Quote: Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people, especially to those who belong to the family of believers.
ListItem.P: We can't CARE unless we are AWARE
Robbers - What is yours is mine - TAKE
Priest, Levite - What is mine is mine - IGNORE
Samaritan - What is mine is yours - HELP
ListItem.Quote: When Jesus saw the crowds, he had compassion on them, because they were harassed and helpless, like sheep without a shepherd.

If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth.

Note.P: TAKE AWAY: What INVESTMENT will you make to love your neighbor>
